definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The fascists massacred those women and children in cold blood.
sentences.chinese: 法西斯分子慘無人道地屠殺了那些婦女兒童。

sentences.english: Yeah, the killer was completely unfeeling. He even killed old ladies!
sentences.chinese: 看了，那個殺手真是慘無人道，連老太太都殺。

sentences.english: You are day and night oppressed with the sting of iniquity for the crimes and wanton cruelties you have committed.
sentences.chinese: 您整日悶悶不樂是因爲您慘無人道，作惡多端。

sentences.english: The new weapon was too inhumane to be used.
sentences.chinese: 這種新式武器太慘無人道而不宜使用。

sentences.english: This exceedingly inhumane incident shocked the whole nation, and indeed the whole world.
sentences.chinese: 這一慘無人道的兇案震驚了中國乃至全世界。

sentences.english: So I think I know what the Nazis were bad of.
sentences.chinese: 所以我知道納粹是慘無人道的。

to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb

to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
